content: That's a great list of recipes! I think I'll start with the Spaghetti Aglio e Olio and Chicken Parmesan. I've always loved the combination of garlic and olive oil. By the way, speaking of dinner parties, I've had a lovely experience at Sarah's place recently, where we played board games until late into the night after the Italian feast. Do you have any recommendations for board games that would be a good fit for a dinner party?
